name: Kastle Of Keys
description:
The Realm has been at peace for millennia... but something has stirred within the Kastle of the Hill....

You play as Steven, a mischievous wizard who has journeyed to the Kastle to figure out what has trembled The Realm. 

You must find the 5 Keys to open the Cellar Door.... and you must save the destiny of The Realm!
